description: The work calendar shall be defined as a set of start, duration, and recurrence rules that can be used to create work calendar entries of a specific type.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: isMadeUpOf
contents.description: The related object(s) makes up part of this work calendar definition entry as the whole.

contents.name: hasPropertiesOf
contents.description: The work calendar definition entry property(s) defines in part this work calendar definition entry.

contents.name: startRule
contents.description: Defines the starting date and time for the work calendar definition entry in ISO 8601 format for a date and time.

contents.name: recurrenceTimeIntervalRule
contents.description: Defines the rule for recurrence of the entry in ISO 8601 format for recurrences.

contents.name: durationRule
contents.description: Defines the duration of the work calendar definition entry in ISO 8601 format for durations.

contents.name: entryType
contents.description: Defines the type of work calendar definition entry. There are no standard entry types defined.
